content:
Experience culinary art at the Sagamore Hotel in Miami Beach. Our various dining venues offer guests robust on-site options that are perfect for any event or occassion. Spend an afternoon relaxing poolside with a cocktail in hand or enjoy a romantic evening with your someone special, enjoying unique and exquisite flavors that are sure to excite the senses and invigorate the mind.

EXECUTIVE CHEF MICHAEL SMERDA: An expert in managing the provision of fine-dining resorts, restaurants and country clubs, Chef Michael Smerda boasts over 22-years of progressive cooking experience. Today, Chef welcomes guests with an open palate as the Executive Chef at Sagamore Hotel Miami Beach's signature restaurant Canvas.
